thread.title: Ammar Elmo Haque
thread.title_full: Jonny Sound & Video reviewed by Ammar Elmo Haque

author: Ammar Elmo Haque
title: Ammar Elmo Haque
text: I can't honestly thank Jonny enough for his work on my project. We hired Jonny Sound & Video to shoot our Launch Video for a new upcoming Youth Organisation. The professionalism his crew brought were outstanding and they way Jonny was able to work with the crew, the actors and myself (the director) was impeccable. It is because of Jonny Sound & Video that our organisation has been as successful as it is, and we will definitely be going back to him for future Film Projects. I would recommend this company to anyone with any project or job, big and small.
